GROOVERS PRESENTS: A NIGHT AT STUDIO 54 Friday, October 24, 2025 9:00 PM 11:59 PM 
Groovers Charleston
(map) Google Calendar ICS GROOVERS PRESENTS: A NIGHT AT STUDIO 54 
Step into the golden age of disco!

We’re bringing the glitz, glamour, and unapologetic disco vibes of the legendary dance floor to Groovers! Think sequins, sparkle, wild energy, and a night where the music never stops. Dress like the icons of Studio 54 and get ready to shine under the disco ball.

Entertainment by Curry, Norway & Thematik

This is more than a party—it’s a disco revival.

Be the first to step into Studio 54

[Page Title: Groovers Charleston]

Welcome to groovers 
New years

at GROOVERS
Live Disco DJ set by Curry entry champagne toast at midnight 
:
Groovers 
Charleston's best
Listening Bar for Cocktails, Live Music, and Vinyl DJs 
Step into Groovers, Charleston's premier listening bar, where we're reviving the spirit of the legendary 90s Calhoun Streetmusic scene.
Enjoy crafted cocktails while immersing yourself in an atmosphere where live musicand vinyl DJs take center stage. 
Experience the nostalgia, great tunes, and a unique vibe that transports you back in time.

Whether you're seeking a laid-back evening of vinyl classics or an electrifying live music performance, Groovers is your go-to destination in Charleston for an unforgettable night.

#GrooveOver

•
#GrooveOver • #GrooveOver • 
MUSIC SCHEDULE
let's get groovy 
DRINK MENU
let's get drinks 
“Very cool new spot

and the only vinyl listening bar

in Charleston. Great cocktails and ambiance.”

“Groovers is a 10/10!

So excited to have a spot like this in Charleston- really one of a kind with a vibrant atmosphere, comfortable lounge and bar seating, incredible music and awesome drinks!”

Upcoming events.
ABOUT Groovers 
Charleston’s go-to listening bar for an unforgettable night of cocktails, live music, and vinyl DJ sets. Paying tribute to the iconic 90s Calhoun Street venue, Groovers brings the best of classic vibes with a modern twist. Sip on cocktails while enjoying live performances or lose yourself in the nostalgic sounds of vinyl records. Whether you're a music lover, a cocktail enthusiast, or just looking for a unique nightlife experience in Charleston, Groovers offers the perfect blend of great tunes and timeless ambiance.
